title: Dr. Debajyoti Datta, MD - Hematologist in San Francisco, CA | Healthgrades
meta_description: Dr. Debajyoti Datta, MD is a hematologist in San Francisco, CA and has over 10 years of experience in the medical field. He graduated from University of California at San Francisco in 2012. He is affiliated with medical facilities Memorial Medical Center and UCSF Helen Diller Medical Center at Parnassus Heights. He is accepting telehealth appointments.
